sentences.en: A squat pot - bellied figure bustled forward through the gloom.
sentences.cn: 一位矮矮胖胖、大腹便便的人影从阴暗处奔了出来.

sentences.en: After returning from Paris, David moved to a squat in Brixton.
sentences.cn: 从巴黎回来后，戴维搬进了布里克斯顿的一座空房里住下了。

sentences.en: Eddie was a short squat fellow in his forties with thinning hair.
sentences.cn: 埃迪四十多岁，矮矮胖胖的，头发日渐稀疏。

sentences.en: Go on, hurry up and fetch another - don't just squat there! "
sentences.cn: 还不快快再去拿一碗来,蹲在这里干什么? ”

sentences.en: He bent to a squat and gathered the puppies on his lap.
sentences.cn: 他弯腰蹲下，把小狗们都抱到自己腿上。

sentences.en: He had a thick, squat nose , which , however , was forceful, and thin, firm, even lips.
sentences.cn: 低厚而有力的鼻子, 严正 、 坚定的薄嘴唇.

sentences.en: He paused to gaze at the squat moose - hide sack.
sentences.cn: 可是,卷了一会,他又停下手,盯着那个鹿皮口袋.

sentences.en: He squatted down beside the little girl.
sentences.cn: 他在小女孩身边蹲了下来。

sentences.en: Key could jump on the direction of bonds, keys can squat. 3.
sentences.cn: 方向键中的上键可以跳跃, 下键可以蹲下.

sentences.en: Now they were stopping at a squat red frame station.
sentences.cn: 他们在一座又矮又小的红色木头房子里停住了.

sentences.en: The boy was shot and squat with the broad ugly pleasant face of a Temne.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩身体矮壮,生着一张丑陋却讨人喜欢的泰姆纳人的扁阔的面孔.

sentences.en: The horse threw himself into a squat.
The house had a squat, resilient look about it.
sentences.cn: 房子低矮, 但看上去很结实.

sentences.en: Thomas now faces eviction from his squat.
sentences.cn: 托马斯现在要被从他占住的房子里驱赶出来。

sentences.en: To pick up a heavy item, squat down beside it.
sentences.cn: 在搬重的东西时, 先在物品的旁边蹲下.

sentences.en: We squatted beside the pool and watched the diver sink slowly down.
sentences.cn: 我们蹲在池边，看潜水员慢慢沉下水。

trans.tran_en: short and thick or low and wide, especially in a way which is not attractive

trans.tran_cn: 蹲坐，蹲姿，擅自占用的土地，[体]蹲举式举重，动物的窝

trans.tran_en: to sit with your knees bent under you and your bottom just off the ground, balancing on your feet

trans.tran_cn: 蹲，蹲伏，擅自占用土地，依法在政府公地上定居，〈口〉坐
使蹲坐，使蹲下，擅自占用
